data.label: Start
data.name: startAgentflow
data.description: Starting point of the agentflow

options.label: Chat Input
options.name: chatInput
options.description: Start the conversation with chat input

options.label: Form Input
options.name: formInput
options.description: Start the workflow with form inputs

inputParams.label: Form Description
inputParams.name: formDescription
inputParams.placeholder: Complete all fields below to continue

inputParams.label: Form Input Types
inputParams.name: formInputTypes
inputParams.description: Specify the type of form input

array.label: Label
array.name: label
array.placeholder: Label for the input

array.label: Variable Name
array.name: name
array.placeholder: Variable name for the input (must be camel case)
array.description: Variable name must be camel case. For example: firstName, lastName, etc.

inputParams.label: Ephemeral Memory
inputParams.name: startEphemeralMemory
inputParams.description: Start fresh for every execution without past chat history

inputParams.label: Flow State
inputParams.name: startState
inputParams.description: Runtime state during the execution of the workflow

array.label: Key
array.name: key
array.placeholder: Foo

array.label: Value
array.name: value
array.placeholder: Bar

inputParams.label: Persist State
inputParams.name: startPersistState
inputParams.description: Persist the state in the same session

data.label: Analyze Requirements
data.name: llmAgentflow
data.description: Large language models to analyze user-provided inputs and generate responses

inputParams.label: Enable Memory
inputParams.name: llmEnableMemory
inputParams.description: Enable memory for the conversation thread

options.label: All Messages
options.name: allMessages
options.description: Retrieve all messages from the conversation

options.label: Window Size
options.name: windowSize
options.description: Uses a fixed window size to surface the last N messages

options.label: Conversation Summary
options.name: conversationSummary
options.description: Summarizes the whole conversation

options.label: Conversation Summary Buffer
options.name: conversationSummaryBuffer
options.description: Summarize conversations once token limit is reached. Default to 2000

inputParams.label: Window Size
inputParams.name: llmMemoryWindowSize
inputParams.description: Uses a fixed window size to surface the last N messages

inputParams.label: Max Token Limit
inputParams.name: llmMemoryMaxTokenLimit
inputParams.description: Summarize conversations once token limit is reached. Default to 2000

inputParams.label: Input Message
inputParams.name: llmUserMessage
inputParams.description: Add an input message as user message at the end of the conversation

inputParams.label: JSON Structured Output
inputParams.name: llmStructuredOutput
inputParams.description: Instruct the LLM to give output in a JSON structured schema

array.label: Enum Values
array.name: enumValues
array.placeholder: value1, value2, value3

array.label: JSON Schema
array.name: jsonSchema
array.description: JSON schema for the structured output

array.label: Description
array.name: description
array.placeholder: Description of the key

inputParams.label: Update Flow State
inputParams.name: llmUpdateState
inputParams.description: Update runtime state during the execution of the workflow

data.label: Planner
data.name: agentAgentflow
data.description: Dynamically choose and utilize tools during runtime, enabling multi-step reasoning

inputParams.label: Knowledge (Document Stores)
inputParams.name: agentKnowledgeDocumentStores
inputParams.description: Give your agent context about different document sources. Document stores must be upserted in advance.

array.label: Describe Knowledge
array.name: docStoreDescription
array.placeholder: Describe what the knowledge base is about, this is useful for the AI to know when and how to search for correct information

inputParams.label: Knowledge (Vector Embeddings)
inputParams.name: agentKnowledgeVSEmbeddings
inputParams.description: Give your agent context about different document sources from existing vector stores and embeddings

array.label: Knowledge Name
array.name: knowledgeName
array.placeholder: A short name for the knowledge base, this is useful for the AI to know when and how to search for correct information

array.label: Describe Knowledge
array.name: knowledgeDescription
array.placeholder: Describe what the knowledge base is about, this is useful for the AI to know when and how to search for correct information

data.label: Did all tests pass?
data.name: conditionAgentAgentflow
data.description: Utilize an agent to split flows based on dynamic conditions

inputParams.label: Instructions
inputParams.name: conditionAgentInstructions
inputParams.description: A general instructions of what the condition agent should do
inputParams.placeholder: Determine if the user is interested in learning about AI

inputParams.label: Input
inputParams.name: conditionAgentInput
inputParams.description: Input to be used for the condition agent

inputParams.label: Scenarios
inputParams.name: conditionAgentScenarios
inputParams.description: Define the scenarios that will be used as the conditions to split the flow

array.label: Scenario
array.name: scenario
array.placeholder: User is asking for a pizza
